response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,200,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this item at an exclusive price tailored to your needs. My proposal is to extend the offer at a price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value, providing you with an excellent return on investment. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations, and we can proceed with the transaction. Thank you for considering our product, and I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
